name: baltimorean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US city of Baltimore: It's so nice to meet another Baltimorean! The restaurant was popular among young Baltimoreans.
More examplesFewer examplesMost Baltimoreans are aware of their hometown's claim on Edgar Allan Poe.What other people think about Baltimore is very important to me and to every Baltimorean who lives here.The play is a celebration of the legacy of the famous black Baltimorean musical pioneer Eubie Blake. She is a native Baltimorean with a deep interest in her city's history.
